description: The docket management system is a database of cases that have been referred to OHMS for public hearings or other action by an administrative law judge and a decision by the Commissioner of the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation. The docket contains cases that were open on or after January 1, 2005.

name: Office of Hearings and Mediation Services (OHMS) Docket Management System: Beginning 2005
